front.title: BGP Flowspec for Computing-Aware Traffic Steering

abstract.t: A BGP Flow Specification is an n-tuple consisting of several matching criteria that can be applied to IP traffic. Computing-Aware Traffic Steering (CATS) is a framework which optimizes traffic steering to a given service instance by taking into account the dynamic nature of both computing and network resources. This document specifies a new BGP Flow Spec Component Type in order to support CATS traffic forwarding.
